body: # jQuery Stripes A jQuery plugin that creates stripes on an img element. Requires `` so no IE8. ## Getting Started Download the [production version][min] or the [development version][max]. [min]: https://raw.github.com/patrickgunderson/jquery.stripes/master/dist/jquery.stripes.min.js [max]: https://raw.github.com/patrickgunderson/jquery.stripes/master/dist/jquery.stripes.js In your web page: ```html ``` http://jsfiddle.net/gunderson/xdaYB/1/ or get stripes as a dataURL image: ```html ``` http://jsfiddle.net/gunderson/v3c5e/1/
name: Jquery.stripes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
